title: Fast Forward to the Future
subtle: Science Fiction (fiction), 2,416 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 590L, Fiction Series
description: Fast Forward to the Future recounts another of Miguel's adventures as he dives into one of The Great Gallardo's books. He travels in time and finds himself at the mercy of the cannibalistic Morlocks-80,000 years into the future. In his haste to escape, he rushes further into the future and finds himself on a dying Earth. Illustrations support the text.
